title: pazhaniyampati vAsan
sahitya:
pazhaniyampati vAsan azhagan murugEsan kazhalaDiyai dinam tozhudiDuvAi manamE


anupallavi

  vizhalukk-iraitta nIrena vINil un kAlattaik-kazhikkAmal irukka pazhagik-karuttuDanE


caraNam    saramAriyAgat-tan sannidhikku malaiyEri varum bhakta kOTiyar vandanai purindadum
paramAnanda inbam peravE aruLmAri pozhindavar tunbam ozhiyak-krpai kUrum
